GUI

Class FileChooserListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.FileChooserListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class FileChooserListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This class is a ActionListener wich is to be called to elegantly assert which Files are to be used during the program.
    Version:
    0.9
    Author:
    ES1-2017-IC1-70

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FileChooserListener.FileType
      This Nested class is used for the Listener to determine by which button it has been called so as to assert which types of Files can be admited or not.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileChooserListener(javax.swing.JTextField path, java.io.File file, FileChooserListener.FileType fileType)
      This method constructs the Listener in association with a FileType to assert if the correct type of File is selected, if so, it utilizes it to extract it's absolute path and represent it visually via the JtextField provided

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent arg0)
      This method call the JFileChooser API for the sorting of the correct file to instantiate

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileChooserListener

        public FileChooserListener(javax.swing.JTextField path,
                           java.io.File file,
                           FileChooserListener.FileType fileType)
        This method constructs the Listener in association with a FileType to assert if the correct type of File is selected, if so, it utilizes it to extract it's absolute path and represent it visually via the JtextField provided
        Parameters:
        path - the TextField object responsible for the visualization of the absolute path of the selected File
        file - selected File in association with the FileType
        fileType - Enumerated of the description of the type of File to be instantiated

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent arg0)
        This method call the JFileChooser API for the sorting of the correct file to instantiate
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
